description: A Toggle chip component used to indicate an on/off state in form inputs. This is equivalent to a checkbox. This is a variation of a checkbox/switch which can be used as an on/off button to trigger an action or used in a group for filtering.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the toggle chip.

props.name: showCheck
props.description: Whether or not to display a checked icon on the toggle chip when it is 'on'.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disabled state of the toggle chip.

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted when the toggle chip is toggled on or off.
